title: Baby Miniature Horse Chases After Man And Makes Him Laugh
text:
Baby Miniature Horse Chases After Man And Makes Him Laugh   
Is there anything cuter than a baby miniature horse? In this cute clip, the baby is in the barn with a man with a camera and when he runs away, she chases after him! Heâ€™s completely smitten with the cutie and I am too!
